*p66153a0832*83 humans store energy as glycogen.(a) (i) which is the correct statement about the formation of glycogen?(1)a  glucose molecules join together by a condensation reactionb  glucose molecules join together by a hydrolysis reactionc  glucose molecules join together by a condensation reactiond  glucose molecules join together by a hydrolysis reaction(ii) name the bond that joins two glucose molecules together.(1)(iii)explain how the structure of glycogen relates to its role as an energy storage molecule.(3)
